changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `charge_line` ( `buyer_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `create_time` datetime NOT NULL, `store_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `product_type` enum('1','2') NOT NULL, `product_id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL, `amt_orig_unit` decimal(16,2) unsigned NOT NULL, `amt_orig_total` decimal(16,2) unsigned NOT NULL, `qty_orig` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `qty_rej` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `qty_rfnd` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `amt_rfnd_unit` decimal(16,2) unsigned NOT NULL, `amt_rfnd_total` decimal(16,2) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`buyer_id`,`create_time`,`store_id`,`product_type`,`product_id`) );
